name: Snow Leopard bookmarks toolbar
description:
This style changes the bookmarks toolbar to closely mimic the look of the dock menus in Mac OS X Snow Leopard.

Because the toolbar floats on the page, it hides by default. A few tweaks in the code can change this.

Complete the Snow Leopard series with these styles:
style 20883
style 21763
style 24273
style 21832
style 24724
style 28658
style 45720
